```{r}
algae <- biomass %>% 
  filter(group == "ALGAE")

algae_NAPL <- algae %>% 
  filter(site == "NAPL")
```

```{r}
algae_NAPL_dm <- algae_NAPL %>% 
  mutate(dry_gm2 = replace(dry_gm2, dry_gm2 < 0, NA)) %>% 
  group_by(year, month, treatment, date) %>% 
  summarize(total_biomass = sum(dry_gm2))

ggplot(algae_NAPL_dm, aes(x = date, y = total_biomass)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  geom_vline(xintercept = as_date("2016-02-09"), color = "red") +
  facet_wrap(~treatment)
```
